name: ClickerGame
description:
What is this game?

Basicly its a clicker game. You earn money by clicking, but to get faster and easier money you can invest your money.Buy tiers, hit power updgrade to get x2 instead of 1 dollar per click.

                                                                      PRO TIPS 

                 Dont wait to raise money by clicking.INVEST INVEST INVEST   

                                                           BASIC CONTROLS

 CLICK with the mouse of course 

HIT POWER BUTTON: press it to multiply the money per click

Tiers: Buy tiers to get money per second faster and faster 

Tier upgrade:Buy it to make the tiers even better to get money per second even faster

                                                                   Who am i?

I am an indie game developer with almost a year of experience. Download my games follow and even DONATE if you like to support even more!
